targets.expr: sum(satellite_egress{name=~"$Node"} + satellite_egress_audit{name=~"$Node"} + satellite_egress_repair{name=~"$Node"}) - sum(satellite_egress{name=~"$Node"} offset 24h + satellite_egress_audit{name=~"$Node"} offset 24h + satellite_egress_repair{name=~"$Node"} offset 24h)

panels.description: Uptime checks occur to make sure your node is still online. This is the percentage of uptime checks you’ve passed.
panels.title: Uptime checks

panels.description:
Audit Checks

Percentage of successful pings/communication between the node & satellite.
panels.title: Audit Checks
